Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2019-05-09T20:11:28Finding aid written in English Describing Archives: A Content Standard
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Lynn Porter-Bernadotte Papers
Porter-Bernadotte, Lynn
Porter-Bernadotte, Lynn
WAG.360
.25 Linear Feet in 1 folder in shared housing
1981-2006 The Lynn Porter-Bernadotte Papers contain photographs, newspaper clippings, and legal documents related to Lynn Porter-Bernadotte's career in the New York City Fire Department. Porter-Bernadotte was one of the first women firefighters in New York City from 1982 to 2000. Materials are in English.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Lynn Porter-Bernadotte in October 2018; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.030
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Biographical Note
Lynn Porter-Bernadette was one of the first women firefighters in New York City. She served in the New York City Fire Department from 1982-2000.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Lynn Porter-Bernadotte Papers; WAG 360; box number; folder number or item identifier; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in an acid-free folder and box, and described on the collection-level.
Scope and Contents
This collection contains photographs, newspaper clippings, and legal materials related to Lynn Porter-Bernadotte's career in the New York City Fire Department.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Lynn Porter-Bernadotte, the creator of this collection, were relinquished and transferred to the public domain in October 2018 by Lynn Porter-Bernadotte. These materials are governed by a Creative Commons CC0 license, which permits publication and reproduction of materials accompanied by full attribution. See, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/
